FormAddOrEditReservation.text19: A gambling tournament run by a pool professional. It will take you about 2.5-3 hours. Learn about the history of pool, its different types, the "real" rules, get tips that will instantly improve your game and compete for our established prizes. You will play in pairs, so you will need fewer tables (e.g. 3-4 tables are enough for a company of 20 people)
